team.six.androidchat

Class ChatActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • team.six.androidchat.ChatActivity

  • public class ChatActivity
extends AppCompatActivity

    This is the mainActivity for the app. It displays all messages for a specified session number and allows authors to enter messages in the specified session.

    Author:
    Cesar Avalos, Alec Knutsen
    See Also:
    AppCompatActivity
